General.Name: Hollywood Intermediate Inc
General.Description: Hollywood Intermediate, Inc. engages in the development, sale, and marketing of digital intermediate motion picture services. Its services include film resolution scanning, digital conforming, color manipulation, titling and effects, digital file recording to 35mm film negative, and high definition conversions and down conversions. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Burbank, California.
General.Address: 801 South Main Street, Burbank, CA, United States, 91506
